{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15703v1", "title": "Susceptibilities of conserved charges of hadronic matter", "summary": "An effective description of hadronic matter in terms of "effective free
particles" is presented. Repulsive interactions among the hadrons have been
modelled by Excluded volume correction by considering the hadrons as liquid
drops, whose volume is inversely proportional to the cube root of the mass of
the species. The only adjustable parameter in the model is pion radius. We get
better agreement to the lattice results as compared to the previous studies.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph", "published": "2025-04-22T08:45:39Z"}
